summary.what_is_a_panel_answer: A panel is a group of participants selected based on characteristics such as age, profession, gender, etc.
summary.when_do_i_need_it_answer: If you don‚Äôt have access to enough people who match your target audience, it makes sense to pay for access to a panel.
summary.what_is_prolific_answer: We're partnering with Prolific to give you access to a pool of over 200.000 vetted participants.
summary.how_to_create_a_panel_step_1: Step 1: Create an account with Prolific
summary.how_to_create_a_panel_step_1_description: Create an account with Prolific and verify your email address.
summary.how_to_create_a_panel_step_2_description: At Prolific, you create a new study where you can pick your preferred audience based on hundreds of characteristics.
summary.how_to_create_a_panel_step_3_description: Set up hidden fields in your Formbricks survey to track which participant provided which answer.
summary.how_to_create_a_panel_step_4_description: Once everything is setup, you can launch your study. Within a few hours you‚Äôll receive the first responses.
summary.enable_ai_insights_banner_description: You can enable the new insights feature for the survey to get AI-based insights for your open-text responses.
summary.enable_ai_insights_banner_tooltip: Kindly contact us at hola@formbricks.com to generate insights for this survey

templates.card_abandonment_survey_description: Understand the reasons behind cart abandonment in your web shop.
templates.card_abandonment_survey_question_1_html: We noticed you left some items in your cart. We would love to understand why.
templates.card_abandonment_survey_question_2_headl: What was the primary reason you didn't complete your purchase?

templates.card_abandonment_survey_question_7_headl: Would you like to receive a discount code via email?
templates.site_abandonment_survey_description: Understand the reasons behind site abandonment in your web shop.
templates.site_abandonment_survey_question_1_html: We noticed you're leaving our site without making a purchase. We would love to understand why.

templates.site_abandonment_survey_question_7_headl: Would you like to receive updates about new products and promotions?
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_descriptio: Measure PMF by assessing how disappointed users would be if your product disappeared.
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_1: We would love to understand your user experience better. Sharing your insight helps a lot.
You are one of our power users! Do you have 5 minutes?
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_2: How disappointed would you be if you could no longer use {{productName}}?
Please select one of the following options:
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_3: Please select one of the following options:
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_4: What type of people do you think would most benefit from {{productName}}?
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_5: What is the main benefit you receive from {{productName}}?
templates.product_market_fit_superhuman_question_6: How can we improve {{productName}} for you?
Please be as specific as possible.

templates.churn_survey_description: Find out why people cancel their subscriptions. These insights are pure gold!
templates.churn_survey_question_1_headline: Why did you cancel your subscription?
templates.churn_survey_question_1_subheader: We're sorry to see you leave. Help us do better:
templates.churn_survey_question_1_choice_5: I just didn't need it anymore
templates.churn_survey_question_2_headline: What would have made {{productName}} easier to use?
templates.churn_survey_question_3_headline: Get 30% off for the next year!
templates.churn_survey_question_3_html: We'd love to keep you as a customer. Happy to offer a 30% discount for the next year.
templates.churn_survey_question_5_html: We aim to provide the best possible customer service. Please email our CEO and she will personally handle your issue.
templates.churn_survey_question_5_headline: So sorry to hear üòî Talk to our CEO directly!
templates.earned_advocacy_score_description: The EAS is a riff off the NPS but asking for actual past behaviour instead of lofty intentions.
templates.earned_advocacy_score_question_1_headlin: Have you actively recommended {{productName}} to others?
templates.earned_advocacy_score_question_4_headlin: Have you actively discouraged others from choosing {{productName}}?
templates.improve_trial_conversion_description: Find out why people stopped their trial. These insights help you improve your funnel.
templates.improve_trial_conversion_question_1_head: Why did you stop your trial?
templates.improve_trial_conversion_question_1_choi: I didn't get much value out of it
It's too expensive for what it does
templates.improve_trial_conversion_question_2_head: Sorry to hear. What was the biggest problem using {{productName}}?

templates.review_prompt_question_3_headline: Sorry to hear! What is ONE thing we can do better?
templates.interview_prompt_description: Invite a specific subset of your users to schedule an interview with your product team.
templates.interview_prompt_question_1_headline: Do you have 15 min to talk to us? üôè
templates.interview_prompt_question_1_html: You're one of our power users. We would love to interview you briefly!
templates.improve_activation_rate_description: Identify weaknesses in your onboarding flow to increase user activation.
templates.improve_activation_rate_question_1_headl: What's the main reason why you haven't finished setting up {{productName}}?
templates.improve_activation_rate_question_1_choic: Difficult to set up or use
templates.improve_activation_rate_question_2_headl: What made you think {{productName}} wouldn't be useful?

templates.improve_activation_rate_question_4_headl: What features or functionality were missing?
templates.improve_activation_rate_question_5_headl: How could we make it easier for you to get started?
templates.improve_activation_rate_question_6_subhe: We're eager to fix it asap.
templates.employee_satisfaction_description: Gauge employee satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.
templates.employee_satisfaction_question_1_headlin: How satisfied are you with your current role?

templates.employee_satisfaction_question_6_headlin: What improvements would you suggest for our workplace?
templates.employee_satisfaction_question_7_headlin: How likely are you to recommend our company to a friend?

templates.new_integration_survey_question_1_headli: Which other tools are you using?
templates.docs_feedback_description: Measure how clear each page of your developer documentation is.
templates.nps_question_1_headline: How likely are you to recommend {{productName}} to a friend or colleague?
templates.nps_question_2_headline: What made you give that rating?
templates.csat_description: Measure the Customer Satisfaction Score of your product or service.
templates.csat_question_1_headline: How likely is it that you would recommend this {{productName}} to a friend or colleague?
templates.csat_question_2_headline: Overall, how satisfied or dissatisfied are you with our {{productName}}
templates.csat_question_3_headline: Which of the following words would you use to describe our {{productName}}?
templates.csat_question_4_headline: How well do our {{productName}} meet your needs?
templates.csat_question_5_headline: How would you rate the quality of the {{productName}}?
templates.csat_question_6_headline: How would you rate the value for money of the {{productName}}?

templates.csat_question_8_choice_6: I haven't made a purchase yet
templates.csat_question_9_headline: How likely are you to purchase any of our {{productName}} again?
templates.csat_question_10_headline: Do you have any other comments, questions or concerns?
templates.collect_feedback_description: Gather comprehensive feedback on your product or service.
templates.collect_feedback_question_1_headline: How do you rate your overall experience?

templates.identify_upsell_opportunities_question_1: How many hours does your team save per week by using {{productName}}?

templates.prioritize_features_question_3_headline: How else could we improve you experience with {{productName}}?

templates.gauge_feature_satisfaction_question_1_he: How easy was it to achieve ... ?

templates.rate_checkout_experience_question_1_head: How easy or difficult was it to complete the checkout?

templates.measure_search_experience_question_3_hea: Lovely! Is there anything we can do to improve your experience?

templates.measure_task_accomplishment_question_4_h: Great! What did you come here to do today?
